description: The Corona-Warn-App needs to handle a large number of users and devices while maintaining scalability.

alternatives.name: Horizontal Scaling
alternatives.description: Adding more servers or nodes to handle increased traffic

alternatives.name: Vertical Scaling
alternatives.description: Increasing the power or resources of existing servers

rationale: To ensure that the Corona-Warn-App can handle a large number of users and devices, we will implement horizontal scaling to add more servers or nodes as needed.

description: The Corona-Warn-App needs to protect user data and prevent unauthorized access.

alternatives.name: Encryption
alternatives.description: Using encryption to protect user data

alternatives.name: Access Control
alternatives.description: Implementing access control mechanisms to restrict user access

rationale: To ensure that user data is protected and unauthorized access is prevented, we will implement encryption to secure user data.

description: The Corona-Warn-App needs to store user data for a certain period while complying with data retention regulations.

alternatives.name: Store Data Locally
alternatives.description: Storing user data on the device

alternatives.name: Store Data Remotely
alternatives.description: Storing user data on remote servers

rationale: To ensure that user data is stored for a certain period while complying with data retention regulations, we will implement remote storage of user data.

description: The Corona-Warn-App needs to identify and assess risks associated with user data and prevent unauthorized access.

alternatives.name: Implement Risk Assessment
alternatives.description: Regularly assessing risk to user data

alternatives.name: Implement Access Control
alternatives.description: Restricting user access to sensitive data

rationale: To ensure that risks associated with user data are identified and assessed, we will implement regular risk assessments.

description: The Corona-Warn-App needs to detect suspicious activity and prevent unauthorized access.

alternatives.name: Implement Logging
alternatives.description: Recording user activity for auditing purposes

rationale: To ensure that suspicious activity is detected and unauthorized access is prevented, we will implement logging to record user activity.
